isis.stitle: POWER STEERING PUMPS LUK VT73 AND LF93 - OPERATION - PRESSURE PLATE

svcproc.title: PRESSURE PLATE
svcproc.para: The pressure plate seals the pumping chamber. The O-ring holds the plate against the cartridge until pressure builds up in the system. System pressure pushes against the area at the back of the plate, which is larger than the area exposed to the pumping cartridge. Thus, an unbalanced force holds the plate against the cartridge, sealing the cartridge and providing proper running clearance for the rotor and vanes.
